title: HPI 21 - Innocent Until Proven Guilty - Mimamsa on Knowledge and Language
itunes:title: HPI 21 - Innocent Until Proven Guilty - Mimamsa on Knowledge and Language
description: The Mīmāṃsā school put their faith in sense experience, and argue that the Veda, and hence language itself, had no beginning.
content:encoded: The Mīmāṃsā school put their faith in sense experience, and argue that the Veda, and hence language itself, had no beginning.
itunes:subtitle: The Mīmāṃsā school put their faith in sense experience, and argue that the Veda, and hence language itself, had no beginning.
itunes:summary: The Mīmāṃsā school put their faith in sense experience, and argue that the Veda, and hence language itself, had no beginning.
itunes:author: Peter Adamson, Jonardon Ganeri, Chike Jeffers
